moduleTitle: Module 3.3: Raise 3D Advanced Filament Printers Training

infoSections.text: **Raise3D's Advanced Filament Printers** offer high-quality, reliable 3D printing for professional use. They support a wide range of materials, including PLA, ABS, Nylon, PETG, and composites. Models like the Pro2 feature dual extrusion for printing complex multi-material objects.

tasks.taskDescription: Complete the "Advanced Filmament Printers (Raise 3D)" module on Canvas and send a screenshot of completion in an email to this email address: lhnt.onboarding@gmail.com
